A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Finaly a fresh take on the tired Star Wars formula. Not everything works and the three main characters could have been utilized a little bit better here and there\, but overall they all get three very strong arcs. Probably the first Star Wars Movie since the very first one\, that's actually true to what it preaches.\n\nThis would have been a great jumping off point for the Finale of the new trilogy or even a new one. Sadly\, that didn't happen.
